channel.title: salt on 丸子有记
channel.description: Recent content in salt on 丸子有记

item.title: saltstack之salt命令大全
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: 常用命令 Copy 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 salt -N 'ceph' test.ping #测试连通性 salt -E '^server10*' test.ping #正则匹配连通性 salt -S 192.168.150.101 test.ping #根据agent ip地址匹配执行 salt -S 192.168.150.0/24 test.ping #根据agent ip
